title: Privacy Policy
description1: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your information when you use our service. We collect basic information such as your email and usage data to provide and improve our service.
description2: We use cookies to enhance your experience and may share data with service providers who help us operate our platform. Your data is securely stored and we don't sell your personal information to third parties. You can request to delete your data at any time by contacting us.
contact_info: For questions about this policy, please contact:
